div3.head: PROPOSITION 32.

p.hi: Any number either is prime or is measured by some prime number.

div3.p: Let A be a number; I say that A either is prime or is measured by some prime number.
If now A is prime, that which was enjoined will have been done.
But if it is composite, some prime number will measure it. [VII. 31]
Therefore any number either is prime or is measured by some prime number. Q. E. D.
